alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:20PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of northwestern Laramie and southeastern Platte Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 119 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from 12 miles west of Chugwater to 10 miles east of Iron Mountain to 7 miles east of Horse Creek to near Federal. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chugwater, Whitaker, Federal and Ranchettes. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 18 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
